awards.name: Humanitarian of the Year
awards.description: Recognizing individuals who have made exceptional contributions to humanitarian causes

nominees.name: John Adebayo
nominees.bio: Dedicated to improving education in rural communities, impacting thousands of lives

nominees.name: Amina Mohammed
nominees.bio: Founded healthcare clinics in 5 northern states serving over 50,000 patients annually

awards.name: Innovator of the Year
awards.description: Celebrating groundbreaking innovations that solve critical Nigerian challenges

nominees.name: Aisha Bello
nominees.bio: Revolutionized sustainable farming with her agricultural tech startup

nominees.name: Musa Abdullahi
nominees.bio: Developed solar-powered irrigation systems for dry regions

rules: One vote per person per category
